text: Canaan Sodindo Banana (5 March 193610 November 2003) was a Zimbabwean Methodist minister, theologian, and politician. He was the first President of Zimbabwe from 1980 to 1987. On 10 November 2003, Banana died of cancer,Canaan Banana of Zimbabwe dead. BBC News. 10 November 2003. Retrieved 2008-07-24. in London at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:Christian theologians Category:Presidents of Zimbabwe
title: Canaan Banana
